tool.name: MapGenerator

param.name: product_as_json
param.dialogReference:
JSON string created by the web application when calling the map generator tool.

Example,

{"productName":"Fixed 25K","makeMapScript":"Fixed25K.pyt","mxd":"CTM25KTemplate.mxd","gridXml":"CTM_UTM_WGS84_grid.xml","pageMargin":"0","exporter":"PDF","exportOption":"Export","geometry":{"rings":[[[-12662593.481251005,5465443.150524709],[-12648678.542898096,5465443.153774508],[-12648678.540560387,5446119.431907058],[-12662593.478913294,5446119.428664084],[-12662593.481251005,5465443.150524709]]],"spatialReference":{"wkid":102100,"latestWkid":3857}},"scale":500000,"pageSize":"LETTER PORTRAIT","mapSheetName":"Mackay Reservoir","customName":""}

tool.summary: This tool work with the POD sample application available with Production mapping server.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool work with the POD sample application available with Production mapping server.
